    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(int playerIndex, int placingCardId, int tableCardId, CornerPos tableCornerPos, Side placingCardSide) throws WrongPlacingPositionException, CardNotPlacedException, GoldCardCannotBePlacedException, CardAlreadyPresentOnTheCornerException, PlacingOnHiddenCornerException, CardAlreadPlacedException, CardIsNotInHandException, WrongInstanceTypeException, CardNotOnBoardException
      Place a card on another
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - Owner of the placing card
      placingCardId - ID of the placing card
      tableCardId - ID of the card already placed
      tableCornerPos - Position on the table Card chosen to be covered
      placingCardSide - Chosen side of the placing card
      Throws:
      WrongPlacingPositionException - The table corner is null
      CardNotPlacedException - The placing of the card has failed
      GoldCardCannotBePlacedException - The placing card cannot be placed due to lack of resources
      CardAlreadyPresentOnTheCornerException - The table corner has already another card on itself
      PlacingOnHiddenCornerException - The table corner is hidden
      CardAlreadPlacedException - The placing card is already on a board
      CardIsNotInHandException - The placing card is not in the player's hand
      WrongInstanceTypeException - The placing card is a starter, so it cant be placed
      CardNotOnBoardException - The table card is not on a board

    • drawCard

      public void drawCard(DrawType drawType) throws InvalidHandException, EmptyDeckException, EmptyMainBoardException
      Draw a card from the mainBoard
      Parameters:
      drawType - The selected card to be drawn : DECKGOLD, SHAREDGOLD1, SHAREDGOLD2, DECKRESOURCE, SHAREDRESOURCE1, SHAREDRESOURCE2
      Throws:
      InvalidHandException - The player has too many card in his hand
      EmptyDeckException - The selected deck is empty
      EmptyMainBoardException - The selected SharedCard doesn't exist

    • flipCard

      public void flipCard(int playerIndex, int cardId) throws CardIsNotInHandException
      Allows to see the other side of a card
      Parameters:
      playerIndex - Owner of the card
      cardId - ID of the card
      Throws:
      CardIsNotInHandException - The card isn't in the player's hand
